name: User Story
about: Create a user story for the project
title: "[USER STORY] "
labels: new
assignees: ""
---

**As a** [type of user]  
**I need** [some goal]  
**So that** [some reason]

---

### Details and Assumptions

- [document what you know]

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [expected outcome]
```
